EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Wetlands

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Deepwater Tavern" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(279) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(484) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(464) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(306) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Deepwater") || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Menethil");

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Darkshore Warrior 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.HasQuest(1718) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1718) || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Warrior;
